cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SP, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the reconstruction of sparse signals using Compressed Sensing techniques, which is a subfield of Information Theory (cs.IT). The proposed algorithm is based on Matching Pursuit, which is a popular method in Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Signal Processing (cs.SP). The paper also discusses the use of a hope-tree, which is a data structure commonly used in Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm in recovering signals, which is a topic of interest in Signal Processing (cs.SP) and Statistical Learning (cs.SI).
